item.title: Seventh Heaven! Ryan Hurls Another No Hitter
item.description: Texas Rangers pitcher Nolan Ryan hurled the seventh no-hitter of his legendary career on Arlington Appreciation Night, defeating the Toronto Blue Jays 3-0. The 44-year-old struck out 16 batters before a crowd of 33,439.
